about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.intro: I am a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in web and mobile development. I love creating efficient, user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems.
about.background: My journey in technology began with my studies in Industrial Computing and Automation at EST La Salle, followed by a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering at IUT Douala. With experience across multiple domains including network management, access control systems, and web/mobile development, I bring a versatile perspective to every project.
about.philosophy: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code while staying at the forefront of technological advancements.
about.conclusion: My goal is to leverage technology to build innovative solutions that make a positive impact.
about.personal_quote: Technology should simplify life, not complicate it. I strive to create solutions that make a real difference.
about.profile_alt: Photo of Fotso Fotso Mossi Bonito

values.title: My Values
values.continuous_learning_desc: Constantly expanding my knowledge and skills to stay at the cutting edge of technology.
values.problem_solving_desc: Finding elegant solutions to complex problems through creative thinking and thorough analysis.
values.attention_to_detail_desc: Focusing on the smallest details to ensure high-quality, polished final products.
values.collaboration_desc: Working effectively with teams to achieve shared goals and create better outcomes.
